# Example geometries

### Graphite geometry
We will use the energy minimization example 

```sh
# LAMMPS data file written by OVITO Basic 3.5.4
8 atoms
1 atom types
0.0 3.57371 xlo xhi
0.0 3.57371 ylo yhi
0.0 3.57371 zlo zhi
6.0e-16 2.0e-16 2.0e-16 xy xz yz

Masses

1 12.0107  # C

Atoms  # charge

1 1 0.0 0.8934275 2.6802825 0.8934275
2 1 0.0 1.0e-16 1.0e-16 1.786855
3 1 0.0 0.8934275 0.8934275 2.6802825
4 1 0.0 3.0e-16 1.786855 0.0
5 1 0.0 2.6802825 2.6802825 2.6802825
6 1 0.0 1.786855 0.0 1.2325951644e-32
7 1 0.0 2.6802825 0.8934275 0.8934275
8 1 0.0 1.786855 1.786855 1.7868551~
```
### Diamond geometry

```sh
# LAMMPS data file written by OVITO Basic 3.5.4
12 atoms
1 atom types
0.0 2.4693712944 xlo xhi
0.0 2.1385382723 ylo yhi
0.0 35.5630722147 zlo zhi
-1.2346856472 0.0 0.0 xy xz yz

Masses

1 12.0107  # C

Atoms  # charge

1 1 0.0 1.2346856472 0.7128460908 10.0493181116
2 1 0.0 0.0 0.0 10.0478126082
3 1 0.0 1.2346856472 0.7128460908 1.8065447967
4 1 0.0 0.0 0.0 1.8050392933
5 1 0.0 -1.1102230246e-16 1.4256921816 21.9036755165
6 1 0.0 1.2346856472 0.7128460908 21.9021700131
7 1 0.0 -1.1102230246e-16 1.4256921816 13.6609022016
8 1 0.0 1.2346856472 0.7128460908 13.6593966982
9 1 0.0 0.0 0.0 33.7580329214
10 1 0.0 -1.1102230246e-16 1.4256921816 33.756527418
11 1 0.0 0.0 0.0 25.5152596065
12 1 0.0 -1.1102230246e-16 1.4256921816 25.51375410311
```
